    • args

      public static Map<String,Object> args(Object... values)
      Transforms your arguments into a map. The first argument is the key, the second is the value, the third is the key, etc.
      Parameters:
      values - The values to transform
      Returns:
      Arguments map
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the number of arguments is odd
      See Also:
      • numArgs(Object...)

    • numArgs

      public static Map<String,Object> numArgs(Object... values)
      Transforms your arguments into a map with keys a0, a1, a2, etc.

      Where number is the index of the argument. Starts from 0.

      Parameters:
      values - The values to transform
      Returns:
      Arguments map
      See Also:
      • args(Object...)
